Tooling
=======

* Implementation in `Python 3 <https://www.python.org/>`_
* Main editor is `Visual Studio Code <https://code.visualstudio.com/>`_
* Static analysis and quality inspections are done in `PyCharm <https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/>`_
* Development environment is using `pipenv <https://pipenv.pypa.io/en/latest/>`_
* Documentation is done with `Sphinx <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/>`_
* Documentation hosting with `ReadTheDocs <https://readthedocs.org/>`_
* CI/CD with `CircleCI <https://circleci.com/>`_
* Test coverage with `CodeCov <https://codecov.io/>`_
* Python package repository `PyPi <https://pypi.org/>`_
* Github badges are provided through `shields.io <https://shields.io/>`_
